DOC.brief_summary: This trial will compare no treatment to exisulind therapy. Patients enrolled on the treatment arm will begin treatment 4 weeks prior to the scheduled date of surgical removal of the prostate and will take 375 mg by mouth daily for the 4 weeks prior to radical prostatectomy. Participants will be followed for total of 2 months from the time of starting study drug.
DOC.criteria: Males 40 years of age and older with prostate cancer who are scheduled to undergo surgical removal of the prostate at Mayo Clinic Rochester, Mayo Clinic Jacksonville, or Mayo Clinic Arizona may be eligible for this protocol.
